function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Open plan living leading to lack of private space","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of transmission due to shared spaces in housing","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased energy consumption in residential buildings due to work from home practices during COVID-19 lockdown","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Population trapped in their homes during the COVID-19 pandemic, leading to increased demand for comfort and flexibility","category":"Living","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible spread of the coronavirus through wastewater","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased promotion of antimicrobial additions in building products","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Health risks associated with toxic antimicrobial additives in indoor finishing materials","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility of virus transmission via contaminated surfaces","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of supply chains and logistical challenges during quarantine","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in human-to-human interaction due to delivery and public services, risking the spread of contagious diseases","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unavailability of icts leading to deficient use of necessary services, such as medical consultation and food/medicines delivery.","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of independent local stores and pharmacies leading to a crisis during lockdowns due to insufficient reserves in food and medicines.","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapidly growing literature on covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Link between zoonotic diseases and climate change & land usage","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close proximity of human, domestic, and wild animal habitats leading to virus mixing and propagation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on external food supply","category":"Commerce/Trade","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of contagious diseases in high-density areas","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of reliable and constant ict connection","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of rainwater storage and filtration may lead to the spread of waterborne diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of measurement for water usage reduction may lead to inaccurate assessment of water-saving efficiency.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on online systems without proper infrastructure may lead to accessibility and connectivity issues during a pandemic.","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper management of medical waste potentially infected with contagious diseases during pandemics.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased consumption of nonrenewable energy","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for virus transmission in shared toilets","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher risk of virus transmission through greywater","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential contamination of building water systems by pathogens","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of measures to limit virus propagation in household wastewater","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsafe drinking water due to contamination","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Main transmission route of the sars-cov-2 is via droplets carried via the air","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation of water features leading to the spread of water-borne diseases","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proper disposal of used disinfectants to avoid possible contact with humans","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Identification and cleaning of high-touch surfaces and occupied spaces","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential exposure to infected surfaces due to high-traffic areas and shared spaces.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited response to waste and wastewater management in assessment systems","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to address environmental resources and comfort categories","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Minimal responsiveness to environmental resources indicators in well standard.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate response to the comfort category in some standards, particularly leed and well.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in approach to residential buildings among green building certification systems","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Importance of balconies for socialization during isolation periods not addressed","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited representation of comfort criteria in leed standards","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to address environmental resources indicators in well and leed standards","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex scoring system with multiple criteria and sub-criteria could lead to oversight of key environmental factors related to disease transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for mental health in the built environment","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete addressing of pvp2 in the well criteria","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient response to the pvp5 indicator in the well criteria","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The focus on health and wellness in buildings may not adequately address contagious disease propagation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific credits in leed for mental health category","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"No matching credits in leed for specific categories pvp2 and pvp5","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Leed not primarily targeting design innovations for stopping virus propagation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Efficiency in cleaning coronavirus not thoroughly addressed in leed pilot credit","category":"Health","confidence":"High"}]}
